CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 21, 1956, pg. 1 reads: "Killer's Weeping Wives - The "wives" of confessed killer David Heath, shown in a deputy sherif's custody, weep as their claimed husband starts towards the jail for a nine-to-eighteen-year sentence for the murder of his North Side landlord...
TitMainTitle: Deputy sheriff, left, escorting convicted murderer David Heath through doorway in corridor of the Allegheny County Courthouse
